name: Backcountry Access Consumer Refill Kit for Float Packs
categories: Consumer Refill Kit for Float Packs
description: Refill your BCA cylinders. This kit includes all the pieces required to refill the cylinders, replace O-rings, and re-grease the seals.Includes: Allen wrench, toothpick, grease, and O-rings.Empty cylinders can be filled at BCA authorized depots.
